name: Stone Ball
overview:
Stone Ball is a mixture of football (soccer) and baseball in a prehistoric setting. In a 2 vs 2 match neither side has a goalie; armed with big clubs, the player(s) have to put a stone ball in the opposite cave.

They can tackle, hustle or hit the opponents. Also scattered around on the field are special bonus items that increase the caveman's speed or power. There are six villages to choose from: Fisher Kings, Islanders, Caverns, Wild Holes, Big Trees and Cold Bears. 2-4 players can play simultaneously.
